Twenty years ago - the signing of the Contract of the Century on September 20, 1994 was a historic event.
Azerbaijan's overall economic and political development has begun from the "Contract of the Century".
The source of the Southern Gas Corridor is the Shah Deniz gas field.
Shah Deniz is one of the world's largest gas fields where gas reserves are more than 1 trillion cubic meters.
Approved gas reserves in Azerbaijan equal to 2.5 trillion cubic meters.
The probable, predicted reserves are at 4-5 trillion cubic meters.
Just after the TANAP project has been agreed, the outlines of the Southern Gas Corridor have already begun to appear.
Today, all the horizons are open to us, the roads are clear.
Together, we must ensure the completion of the Southern Gas Corridor and will do so.
This project will bring additional dividends to Azerbaijan. The country's economy will grow even faster.
During the last ten years the gross domestic product in Azerbaijan has increased more than 3 times, budget expenditures increased by 20 times.
Foreign debt accounts for about eight percent of our gross domestic product. Unemployment has dropped to 5 percent, and poverty is slightly above 5 percent.

This project is also very beneficial for our partner countries. The project will not be the loser as a result of the implementation.
Consumers will also achieve diversification of gas sources. This project is Europe's energy security project.
So far only 3 countries have participated in our gas and oil projects - Azerbaijan, Georgia and Turkey.
After this day, we are launching a broad international cooperation process.

This port is the largest trading port in the Caspian Sea and serves all Caspian littoral countries.
Azerbaijan provides its own energy security as well as the energy security of Europe (cont) http://t.co/hWv10ssPzO
We work actively to ensure food security and provide ourselves with basic foodstuffs.
At present, existing transport infrastructure facilities in Azerbaijan provide our transport security.
Thanks to the Baku-Tbilisi-Kars railroad, for the first time, Azerbaijan is joining Europe through the railway.
Azerbaijan will become a railway bridge between Europe and Asia.
We are actively working to turn Azerbaijan into a transport and logistics center as a whole.
The purpose of all these efforts is to further strengthen Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijan is open for investments.
Thousands of foreign companies operate in Azerbaijan, work, receive contracts from the state and execute those contracts.
The key condition we put before our foreign companies is quality and most up-to-date standards.

Since 1990, #EU #greenhousegas emissions have fallen by 19%, while GDP rose by 45%. @EUClimateAction #climate2014
#EU proves that #climate protection and strong #economy can & must go hand-in-hand. @EUClimateAction #climate2014
#EU is leading by example. @EU_Commission has proposed ambitious reduction #emission target of 40% by 2030. #ClimateAction #Climate2014
Our aim is to spend 20% of 2014-2020 #EU #budget on #ClimateAction: €180 bln spent inside and outside #EU. #climate2014
Over next 7 yrs #EU aims to allocate more than €3 billion grants to support sustainable #energy in developing countries. #climate2014
#EU will provide €14 billion of public #climate finance to partners outside the EU over the next 7 years. @EUClimateAction #climate2014
